Package com.codisimus.plugins.phatloots.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChestBreakEvent
    Called when a PhatLootChest breaks
    ChestRespawnEvent
    Called when a PhatLootChest respawns
    LootEvent
    Called when a PhatLoot is lootedThe LootingBonus which may be positive of negative
    MobDropLootEvent
    Called when a mob is killed and drops custom loot
    MobEquipEvent
    Called when a mob is spawned and given a weapon/armor/potion effect
    PhatLootChestEvent
    The basis of a PhatLootChest Event
    PhatLootsEvent
    The basis of a PhatLoots Event
    PlayerLootEvent
    Called when a Player loots a PhatLoot
    PreLootEvent
    Called when a PhatLoot is about to be looted
    PreMobDropLootEvent
    Called when a mob is killed and drops custom loot
    PreMobEquipEvent
    Called when a mob is spawned and given a weapon/armor
    PrePlayerLootEvent
    Called before a Player loots a PhatLoot
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChestRespawnEvent.RespawnReason
